claim: Dungeons & Dragons was first published by Tactical Studies Rules, Inc.
LM: Dungeons & Dragons ( abbreviated as D&D or DnD ) is a fantasy tabletop role-playing game ( RPG ) originally designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson , and first published in 1974 by Tactical Studies Rules , Inc. ( TSR ) .

claim: The Prestige features Scarlett Johansson.

claim: The middle name of Carl Sanders is Edward.
LM: Carl Edward Sanders Sr. ( May 15 , 1925 - November 16 , 2014 ) was an American politician who served as the 74th Governor of the state of Georgia from 1963 to 1967 .

claim: Alpha House is inspired by Congressman Dick Durbin.
LM: The series is inspired by several actual Democratic legislators who share a row house in D.C. : Senator Dick Durbin ( D-IL ) , Senator Chuck Schumer ( D-NY ) , and Representative George Miller ( D-CA ) . He is currently dean of the Illinois congressional delegation , as he has served in Congress since 1983 as a U.S. Representative from Illinois 20th Congressional District , and from 1997 as a U.S. Senator from Illinois .

claim: The Right Stuff is a historical documentary.
LM: The Right Stuff is a 1983 American epic historical drama film that was adapted from Tom Wolfe 's best-selling 1979 book of the same name about the Navy , Marine and Air Force test pilots who were involved in aeronautical research at Edwards Air Force Base , California , as well as the seven military pilots who were selected to be the astronauts for Project Mercury , the first manned spaceflight by the United States .

claim: The Jackson family only included people born in the 1940s.

claim: Ellen Pompeo didn't earn money in 2015.
